page.title: 08Killymoon Golf continued
page.content: {beautiful course,}rated as one of the best inland golf courses in{Ireland. {Green fees for 1985}are as follows: { Ladies}_ Weekdays Â£2.50 (Â£2.00) { Men } _ Weekdays Â£3.50 (Â£3.00) { Juniors}(11_18) Â£1.50 {Public Holidays Ladies}Sat./Sun. Â£3.50 (Â£3.00) { Public Holidays Men}Sat./Sun. Â£5.00 (Â£4.00) Fee,when accompanied by a member, in brackets. {Weekly Ticket:}Â£15.00 { Monthly Ticket:}Â£30.00 The high{membership}(approx.600) reflects the popularty of the game & {the clubhouse}provides a friendly atmosphere with licensed catering facilities available.
